assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mtf","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMTF"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

பொருத்துக

\n","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"option":{"optionsLHS":[{"text":"1024 டேராபைட்","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","index":1,"$$hashKey":"object:1285"},{"text":"குறுந்தகடு / குறுவட்டு","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","index":2,"$$hashKey":"object:1286"},{"text":"பிட்","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","index":3,"$$hashKey":"object:1287"},{"text":"விரலி","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","index":4,"$$hashKey":"object:1311"},{"text":"உள்ளீட்டுக கருவி","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","index":5,"$$hashKey":"object:1319"}],"optionsRHS":[{"text":"1 பீட்டா பைட்","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","mapIndex":1},{"text":"இரண்டாம் நிலை நினைவக அலகு","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","mapIndex":2},{"text":"0 அல்லது","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","mapIndex":3},{"text":"வெளியீட்டு அலகு","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","mapIndex":4},{"text":"நுண்ணொலி வாங்கி / ஒலி வாங","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","mapIndex":5}],"questionCount":0},"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"questionMaxScore":1,"isShuffleOption":false,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Vertical","name":"AXHZ3E பொருத்துக","title":"AXHZ3E பொருத்துக","medium":"Tamil","qlevel":"EASY","gradeLevel":["Class 9"],"subject":"Science","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","max_score":1,"description":"கணினியின் பாகங்கள்","category":"MTF"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Vertical","isShuffleOption":false,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
